reviews.review_text: An entirely new kind of experience!

Here are what it says to me:  Let's go This way Over here It's straight ahead Straight ahead Come on, get closer You're close You're really close On your right Turn right More to the right On your left Turn left Over to the left No, I'm behind you Turn around It's behind you That's it!

One of the most fantastic ideas I've ever seen (or heard!)  Even though it's a quite simple game, it's core idea is just amazing. It's not just an inclusive game, but it also gives you a small (and simplified) perception of all the difficulties a blind person may face.
This game is so different and great. I love this game because it takes such a different approach. No stunning graphics, no amazing PhysX, just you and your headphones.
